# [Interview #1159: Shadows of Self-Brookline, Entry #18](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1159#18)

#### AndrewStirlingMacDonald

Is it possible for a kandra to use invested material to form a true body?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes, that's a possibility.

#### AndrewStirlingMacDonald

Could they use shardplate?

#### Brandon Sanderson

They absolutely could.
